title: Trial Lawyer Lee Cirsch Named Managing Attorney of The Lanier Law Firm's Los Angeles Office
text:
LOS ANGELES, March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The Lanier Law Firm has named veteran trial lawyer Lee Cirsch managing attorney of the firm's Los Angeles office, which has moved to a new location in the Woodland Hills area of Los Angeles.
Mr. Cirsch's practice is national in scope, representing clients in both consumer and commercial litigation. His expertise includes representing plaintiffs in mass tort and consumer protection class actions, pharmaceutical and medical device litigation and other types of products liability and personal injury matters.
Mr. Cirsch has played key roles in multidistrict litigation (MDL) actions on behalf of individuals who have suffered serious medical complications from defective metal-on-metal hip implants manufactured by DePuy Orthopaedics and Johnson & Johnson. The Lanier team has secured three jury verdicts of nearly $2 billion in those cases over the last two years.
Mr. Cirsch was a key member of the Lanier trial team that secured a $9 billion jury verdict on behalf of individuals injured after taking the diabetes drug Actos. Mr. Cirsch is also overseeing numerous cases against Johnson & Johnson and Imerys Talc America on behalf of women who have been diagnosed with ovarian cancer after using Johnson's Baby Powder and other talc-based products.
In addition, Mr. Cirsch focuses on representing individuals and businesses that are harmed by companies that engage in unfair competition and other tortious and unlawful business practices.
"Lee really stands out among trial lawyers when it comes to courtroom talent and dedication to his clients and their causes," said firm founder Mark Lanier. "We're proud to have him leading our West Coast office."
The promotion coincides with the move of the firm's West Coast office to the Woodland Hills area of Los Angeles. The new office is located at 21550 Oxnard Street, Woodland Hills, CA 91367.
With offices in Houston, New York and Los Angeles, The Lanier Law Firm is committed to addressing client concerns with effective and innovative solutions in courtrooms across the country. The firm is composed of outstanding trial attorneys with decades of experience handling cases involving pharmaceutical liability, asbestos exposure, commercial litigation, product liability, maritime law, and sports and entertainment law.
